<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and fixed all issues

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the README (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested on multiple platforms (if UI changes)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] I have documented any new dependencies in the PR description
- [ ] Dependencies are pinned to specific versions

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] I have documented breaking changes (if any)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have considered backward compatibility
